com.ucsf.core.services

Class BackgroundService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.ucsf.core.services.BackgroundService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrequentRecurringService, GPSLocationService, RangingService

    public abstract class BackgroundService
extends Service
    Abstract definition of a service running in the background. Inherits from Service. Such services continue to run even if the application is closed by the user. If you need a service running in the background, but doing some processing at regular intervals, use FrequentRecurringService instead.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BackgroundService.Binder
      Class giving access to the background service when Context#bindService(Intent, ServiceConnection, int)
      static class  BackgroundService.Provider
      Abstract background service provider (seet Services.Provider).
